XXmaivy_iu:151: kṛtvā tu kuśalaṃ karma hy MvyK_70c
XXmaivy_iu:283: tasmād dharme ca buddhe ca MvyG_105a
XXmaivy_iu:305: tasyām eva ca rātrau hi MvyG_56c
XXmaivy_iu:669: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṅghaṃ ca MvyG_75c
XXmaivy_iu:670: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṅghaṃ ca MvyC_73a
XXmaivy_iu:671: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca MvyK_70a
XXmaivy_iu:810: yasyām eva ca rātrau sa MvyG_56a
XXmaivy_iu:815: ye ca tasmin pure martyāḥ MvyK_19a
XXmaivy_iu:816: ye tu ketumatīṃ ke cid MvyG_88a
XXmaivy_iu:943: śrutvā ca te tato dharmaṃ MvyG_77c
XXmaivy_iu:1018: sarve te hy asravān dharmān MvyC_77c
